channel.title: Can YOU test my webclient?
channel.description:
Can you please Test my webclient its downloading well nothing problem with that but when my friend tryed to enter he got connection error so is the problem in the client or in my friend :S
or in the ''Remobo VPN'' its shitty but my own IP is broken and hamachi too i don't know why but i can't download hamachi anymore ;S
PS. If you could help with hosting the server like using your IP/Hamachi? Ty
Test My Client : http://trollescape.webs.com/Prototype.html
Edit:* My real site is not using WEBS my real site is now under construction so i don't want to show it and
i don't haven't edit much of source some of xp ratings. so server is going to be very much different :D
